form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, Form FS-256a (Revised August 1932)

full_text: 1 for Form FS-256a (Revised August 1952) FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UN TES OF AMERICA Approved Bureau Budget No. 47-R108.2 APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA I- 992855 AND ALIEN REGISTRATION I, the undersigned, being duly sworn, state the following facts regarding myself and hereby make application for an IMMIGRANT VISA and ALIEN REGISTRATION under the Immigration and Nationality Act to the American Consul CIUDAD JUAREZ, CHIHUAHUA, MEXICO at 1. Family name Given name Initial 2. Place and date of birth Age Alvarez Soledad Labrado de Hda, de Corrale to Sandiego, 47 Chih.Mex. 10/25/07 3. Other names by which I have been known 4. Last permanent residence Soledad Labrado Alvarado Calle Laton No. 2/7 Nte. C. Juarez, Chih. Mex. 5. Address in the United States 6. Name and address of person to whom destined, if any 609 So. Oregon St. El Paso, Tex. Alberto Acosta.-adoptive-son.-add. as it. 5. 7. Name and address of nearest relative in home country 8. Travel documents presented Eulogio Labrado -father. -2a. Donato Guerra 1715. Ciudad Juarez, Chih. Mex. Mex. ppt. 9. Hair 10. Eyes 11. Height 12. Weight 13. Nationality 15. Race 17. Sex 18. Marital status black- mexican white. brn. M Married Single gry. 4 ft. 11 130 14. Complexion 16. Ethnic Classification in. lbs. dark mexican. F Widowed Divorced 19. Occupation 20. Distinguishing marks 21. Languages spoken, read, or written home-duties. large dark spot under chin. Spanish. 22. Intended United States port of entry 23. Final destination 24. I have (a) (no) 25. Purpose of going to the United States El Paso, Tex. through ticket to same as it. 5. destination no To reside. 26. Places of previous residence Hda. de Corralejo Sandiego, Chih. Parral, Chih. -C. Juarez, Chih.Mex. El Paso, Tex. 27. Names and places of residence of spouse and minor children Jose Maria Alvarez Carrillo. immigrating same date. 28. Name and address of father 29. Name and address of mother Eulogio Labrado.-add. as it. 7 Maria de Jesus Alvarado de Labrado.. add. as it. 7 30. I claim to be a nonquota immigrant and my claim is based on the 31. Available documents required by the Immigration and Nationality Act are filed herewith and made a part hereof, as follows (Sec. 222 (b)) following facts: Medical Cert. Born in Mexico Birth Cert. Police. 32. I have never been: Arrested; convicted; in prison; in an almshouse; treated in an institution, hospital, or other place, for insanity or other mental disease; the beneficiary of a pardon or amnesty, except as hereinafter stated: I have never been arrested. (Nunca he S ido arrestada) 33. I have never applied to any American consular officer, either formally or informally, for a visa or other documentation as an immigrant or nonimmigrant, except as hereinafter stated: 34. I have never been excluded, deported, or removed from the United States at Government expense, except as hereinafter stated: Deported on 1930, granted permission to reapply on 1948, has BCC. since 1948. ne 16-67444-2 (Application continued on reverse side)
